tweet_text: @recovery_rocks_ @CHCHNews @JGaidolaCHCH If your employer has a vaccine mandate you get vaccinated. If you choose to refuse the employer’s vaccine mandate & not get vaccinated then they can terminate your employment. It’s that simple & it’s your choice. Your job strictly depends on your choices. You like a pay cheque?

tweet_text: @eevblog YouTube is getting worse. The app keeps telling me there's "new content" from people who don't have new content. And the annoying UI changes mess with my comfortable flow of muscle memory! And it keeps forgetting where I left a video so I need to forward to where I left it.
